retry.title: Retry Attempts

extensionNotFound.title: Extension Not Installed
extensionNotFound.subTitle: This page works with the Auto Clicker - AutoFill extension for Chrome & Edge.
extensionNotFound.hint: Please install the extension first to get started.

stepSettings.title: Step Settings
stepSettings.info: These settings apply only to this step and its pre-check, and will take priority over your Global Settings.
stepSettings.iframeFirstHint: Look inside any embedded content on the page before searching the main page

retry.title: If Item Not Found
retry.hint: Choose what should happen if the item cannot be found, even after retrying.

stateGuard.title: State Guard
stateGuard.info: Set a rule to control whether this step should run, based on what happened in the previous steps.
stateGuard.hint: What should happen if the rule is not met?

pageGuard.title: Page Guard
pageGuard.info: Only run this step if a value on the page meets your condition.
pageGuard.valueExtractorHint: Use a pattern to pull out a specific part of the value. For example, extract 24.00 from $24.00, or 10 from 10 automations.

recheck.title: If Condition Not Met
recheck.hint: Choose what should happen if the filter condition is not met.

schedule.title: Schedule Automation
schedule.info: Run this automation on a specific date and time

upgradePlan.title: Upgrade Plan
upgradePlan.subtitle: Unlock advanced features and get the most out of Auto Clicker AutoFill.

pro.name: Pro Subscription
pro.tagline: Everything you need to automate without limits

googleSheets.title: Google Sheets
googleSheets.hint: Connect your Google Sheets account to easily export your automations and logs, and keep track of your automation history in one place.

useStable.title: Use Stable Versions for Google Sheets Features.
useStable.message: For optimal performance and reliability in Google Sheets, it's recommended to utilize <1>stable</1> versions of its features. These versions undergo thorough testing to ensure seamless functionality, providing you with a dependable platform for your tasks. By prioritizing stability, you can enhance your productivity and minimize the risk of encountering unexpected issues. If you need assistance or guidance on leveraging Google Sheets effectively, feel free to reach out for support!.

googleSheets.loginRequired: Please <1>Login</1> to your account before connecting with Google Sheets.

automations.title: My Automations
automations.selectAutomations: Select automations to export or delete

automation.title: Automation
automation.name: Name
automation.noConfig: No Automation Found, Please refine your search.

confirm.title: Remove Automation
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove [{{name}}] automation?

automationSettings.title: Automation Settings
automationSettings.autoHint: Automatic — runs by itself every time the page loads. No action needed from you.
automationSettings.manualHint: Manual — only runs when you press your defined keyboard shortcut.
automationSettings.windowHint: After Full Load (Recommended) — automation starts after the entire page including images and scripts has finished loading.
automationSettings.documentHint: As Page Loads — automation starts as soon as the page structure is ready, before images and scripts finish loading. Faster but may be unstable on some pages.
automationSettings.triggerUrlChangeHint: Run on Page Navigation — re-runs the automation when the page address changes without a full reload. Useful for Gmail, Twitter, and other modern apps.

bypass.title: Bypass Browser Default Behavior for Hotkeys

loop.title: Loop
loop.repeatHint: Repeat will re run all steps without reloading page with the interval given.
loop.refreshHint: Refresh will reload the page once all steps are completed.

error.url: Please enter a website URL to continue
error.scheduleDate: Please enter a valid date in this format: 2025-12-01
error.scheduleTime: Please enter a valid time in this format: 23:59:59.000
error.scheduleRepeat: Please enter a valid number for how many times to repeat
error.startTime: Please enter a valid start time in this format: 12:12:12:000
error.json: The selected file is not a valid JSON — please check and try again
error.hotKey: Please use a letter combined with Ctrl, Alt, or Shift (e.g. Ctrl + A)
error.valueExtractor: The pattern you entered is not valid — please check and try again
error.value: Please enter a value to continue
error.condition: Please select a condition to continue
error.elementFinder: Please enter how to find the item on the page

remove.title: Remove Step
remove.message: Are you sure to remove [{{name}}] Step?

remove.title: Remove User Script
remove.message: Are you sure to remove [{{name}}] User Script?

startTime.content:
Try <1>Schedule URL our new browser extension.
it's used to schedule webpage / URL at particular day and time

hotkey.title: Hotkey
hotkey.content: Press hotkey on keyboard to auto type in field
hotkey.hint: Single letter without <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>, <kbd>Alt</kbd> or <kbd>Shift</kbd> is not valid

monitor.title: Monitor
monitor.enabledHint: Automatically re-run actions when new matching elements are added to the page (e.g., for infinite scrolling, async content)
monitor.rootSelectorHint: CSS selector for container to observe
monitor.attributesHint: Comma-separated list of attributes to observe for changes
monitor.debounceHint: Delay before processing new elements (1-5 seconds)
monitor.urlChangeHint: Automatically stop watching when page URL changes

home.title: Welcome to Auto Clicker - AutoFill
home.subtitle: Automate clicks and form fills on any website by defining targets and actions.

step1.title: 1. Install the Extension
step1.desc: Download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store or Edge Add-ons.

step2.title: 2. Configure a Target Page
step2.desc: Open a web page, right-click any element and choose Auto Clicker - AutoFill → Configure for this Field.

step3.title: 3. Save & Run
step3.desc: Save your configuration and reload the target page. The automation runs automatically.

tip1.title: Try on the Test Page
tip1.desc: Open test.getautoclicker.com, add two actions — one to fill a username field and one to click a button — then save and run.

tip2.title: Target Items Precisely
tip2.desc: Use element paths to target specific items on a page, like //input[@name="username"], for more reliable automation.

tip3.title: Handle Slow Page Loads
tip3.desc: Set a Wait Before Start on your automation if the page loads slowly before your steps run.

tip4.title: Global Settings & Hotkeys
tip4.desc: Configure start mode, define a keyboard shortcut, and adjust the status bar position in Global Settings.

tip5.title: Right-click to Auto-Capture
tip5.desc: Right-click any input or button on a page and select Configure for this Field to auto-fill the URL and Element Finder.

video1.title: Getting Started with Auto Clicker AutoFill
